statement.p: In 25.53 of the last 47 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{47}}={0.2553}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{47}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2553}\cdot{47}={11.9991}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 47-11.9991=35.0009 We round that as requested to 35.
